amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding for the Northern Border Regional Commission to FY19 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Northern Border Regional Commission to FY19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 283 (Roll no. 540).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 283 (Roll no. 540).
